# es-status

Display the status of something

## Example

```jsx
<es-status status={'okay'} />
```

<es-status status={'okay'} />

## Properties

| Property              | Attribute | Description | Type                                 | Default     |
| --------------------- | --------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `status` _(required)_ | `status`  |             | `"critical" \| "degraded" \| "okay"` | `undefined` |
